short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates video duration based on playback speed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin will calculate the time of a YT video, it displays two timestamps the first shows the time that already have passed of the video in proportion to the calculated total duration of the video, the second timestamp shows the calculated duration of the original video

basically, if you increase the speed of your YT videos often this plugin will make it easier to see how much time is left of the video.
